description: A winter island in the Grand Line known for its constant snow and its former reputation for having excellent doctors. The island is dominated by the towering Drum Rockies mountains.

keyEvents.title: Wapol Intercepts Luffy
keyEvents.description: Wapol and his men intercept Luffy on Drum Island as he tries to reach the mountain.
keyEvents.significance: The conflict between Luffy and Wapol escalates on the island.

keyEvents.title: Lapahn Repays Luffy's Kindness
keyEvents.description: The Lapahn that Luffy saved returns with its group to help Luffy escape from Wapol on Drum Island.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates how acts of kindness create unexpected allies.

description: A series of towering, near-vertical mountain peaks on Drum Island. The tallest peak houses Drum Castle at its summit. The mountains are extremely difficult to climb, especially in the harsh winter conditions.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Begins Climbing Drum Rockies
keyEvents.description: Luffy begins climbing the nearly vertical Drum Rockies mountain while carrying both Sanji and Nami on his back.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most iconic displays of Luffy's determination and willpower.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Reaches the Summit
keyEvents.description: After three hours of climbing, Luffy finally reaches the top of Drum Rockies where Drum Castle stands.
keyEvents.significance: The climax of Luffy's impressive feat of endurance.

statusHistory.reason: Drum Rockies debuts as a major location in this episode

description: A large castle situated at the top of the tallest Drum Rockies peak. It serves as the home and medical practice of Dr. Kureha and Tony Tony Chopper.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Reaches the Summit
keyEvents.description: Luffy finally arrives at Drum Castle after his grueling climb up the mountain.
keyEvents.significance: Luffy successfully delivers Nami and Sanji to the doctor.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Helps Luffy at the Summit
keyEvents.description: Chopper helps Luffy when he arrives at Drum Castle and brings the weakened pirates inside for treatment.
keyEvents.significance: Chopper's first major act of kindness toward the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Nami Meets Chopper
keyEvents.description: Inside Drum Castle, Nami awakens and meets Chopper for the first time.
keyEvents.significance: Beginning of Nami's relationship with the crew's future doctor.

keyEvents.title: Kureha and Chopper Tend to the Crew
keyEvents.description: Dr. Kureha and Chopper work together to treat the weakened Straw Hats inside Drum Castle.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the medical capabilities of Kureha and Chopper.

description: One of the main villages on Drum Island. The villagers are loyal to Dalton and oppose Wapol's tyranny.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Confronts Wapol's Soldiers
keyEvents.description: At Bighorn village, Zoro defeats Wapol's soldiers who were gloating over Dalton's burial.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Straw Hats' commitment to helping Drum Island's people.

keyEvents.title: Villagers Rescue Dalton
keyEvents.description: The villagers of Bighorn dig through the snow to rescue Dalton after Zoro defeats Wapol's soldiers.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the villagers' loyalty to Dalton.
